item.title: The world is taking notice of Suu Balm's ability to soothe the skin
item.description:
Developed by the National Skin Centre (NSC), Suu Balm is Singapore’s first clinically proven moisturizing cream that rapidly relieves itch. Good Pharma Dermatology, the company behind Suu Balm, states that the cream is the world’s first dual-action, non-prescription solution available to consumers. As a result of its effectiveness, over 40% of local dermatologists recommend Suu Balm to treat dry, sensitive, and irritated skin. Source: Good Pharma Dermatology. Suu Balm. With help from International Enterprise Singapore (IE) and Intellectual Property Intermediary (IPI) Singapore, Suu Balm is gaining international recognition...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-world-is-taking-notice-of-suu-balm-s-ability-to-soothe-the-skin/
